entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, St. Alban's
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 50 km/h gusting to 70 except gusting to 90 along exposed areas of the coast this evening. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly cloudy. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 70. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. High zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Monday 20 March 2023
